workshoptitle: DBA Essentials - Administer Oracle Database 23ai with Oracle Enterprise Manager

tutorials.title: Introduction
tutorials.description: The workshop on administering Oracle Database from Oracle Enterprise Manager (EM).

tutorials.title: Lab 1: Initialize environment
tutorials.description: How to initialize and start all the workshop components.

tutorials.title: Lab 2: View database details from SQL command line
tutorials.description: How to view database details from SQL command line.

tutorials.title: Lab 3: Manage targets - Oracle Database and Listener
tutorials.description: How to manage targets, Oracle Database and Listener, using EM.

tutorials.title: Lab 4: Access container home page
tutorials.description: How to access container home page from EM.

tutorials.title: Need help?
tutorials.description: Solutions to common problems and directions for receiving live help
